name: Curvea3CRVVoterProxy
description: This vault accepts deposits of a3CRV tokens obtained by supplying either DAI, USDC, or USDT (or their wrapped aTokens) to the liquidity pool on Curve here. a3CRV tokens are staked in the gauge on Curve to earn CRV rewards. Rewards are swapped for one of the underlying assets and resupplied to the liquidity pool to obtain more a3CRV.
